page.title: 01DESCRIPTION OF OUR AREA
page.content: Our area is a rural area with one small village called{Folly Gate}and a Hamlet called{Brightley. }The river Okement runs though a lovely wooded valley on the eastern side. The holiday route which takes the traffic round{Okehampton }goes through the centre of{Folly Gate}which makes it very busy during the summer.{ { Folly Gate}is often snowed up in the winter as it is very high up and exposed. The children at Okehampton Comprehensive are always sent home early if it looks like it's going to snow. There is a bus service which passes through Folly Gate about four times a day. {Woods}cover a large area and are mostly coniferous. It is a very hilly area with high banks along the sides of the roads and in spring and summer {wild flowers}are in abundance.
